form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, A10 294 862 DB

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 NE-178 12-56(20) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE PLEASE REFER TO THIS FILE NUMBER 20 West Broadway A10 294 862 DB New York 7, New York April 17, 1962 British Visa Office 630 Fifth Avenue New York, New York RE-PRESENT. Refer out letter of Dear Sir: June 3, 1959. Herewith is passport data relating to the case of MAR DOO aka MAR AU SANG subject of deporta- tion proceedings by this Service, for whom passport facilities are desired. for entry into Hong Kong. Since this Service is anxious to complete the de- portation proceedings, it will be greatly appreciated if you will expedite the issuance of a travel document. If travel document cannot be issued locally and it is necessary to refer this matter abroad, it is request- ed that cable facilities be utilized. This Service will assume the costs involved. Very truly yours, DISTRICT DIRECTOR By: CC: H.WEBB/BY HAND EJH/vat MASIL J. MASON Supervisory Deportation Officer Enclosures Copy of warrant of deportation Certificate of Identity British Visa Application Forms British Visa Application Card Fingerprint chart; photographs Photostat of Identification Card issued in Hong Kong Photostat of Hong Kong Seaman's Discharge Book #28570 NOTE: File does not reflect any criminal record.
